multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is NOT belong to the project charter?

choicegroup.choice: a high-level document which is easy to understand and contains all the fundamental information about the project: project objectives, scope, stakeholder list, budget, etc.
a detail-level document which contains all the information about the project: project objectives, scope, stakeholder list, budget, etc.
a document is done by the project owner
A document is used to officially appoint the project manager
